001package imagingbook.common.geometry.shape;
002
003import java.awt.Shape;
004import java.awt.geom.PathIterator;
005import java.util.Iterator;
006
007import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
008import imagingbook.common.geometry.circle.GeometricCircle;
009
010public class ShapePointIterator implements Iterator<Pnt2d> {
011        
012        private final PathIterator pi;
013        private final double coords[] = new double[6];
014        
015        public ShapePointIterator(Shape s, double flatness) {
016                this.pi = s.getPathIterator(null, flatness);
017        }
018
019        @Override
020        public boolean hasNext() {
021                return !pi.isDone();
022        }
023
024        @Override
025        public Pnt2d next() {
026                if (pi.isDone()) {
027                        return null;
028                }
029                else {
030                        pi.currentSegment(coords);
031                        pi.next();
032                        return Pnt2d.from(coords[0], coords[1]);
033                }
034        }
035
036        
037        public static void main(String[] args) {
038                Pnt2d ctr = Pnt2d.from(20, 30);
039                GeometricCircle gc = new GeometricCircle(20, 30, 100);
040                Shape circle = gc.getShape();
041                System.out.println("circle = " + circle);
042                
043//              ShapePointIterator iter = new ShapePointIterator(circle, 0.01);
044//              while(iter.hasNext()) {
045//                      Pnt2d p = iter.next();
046//                      System.out.println(p + " dist = " + gc.getDistance(p));
047//              }
048                
049                System.out.println("checkShape = " + gc.checkShape(circle, 0.5));
050                
051        }
052}
